longBusinessSummary: Asian Hotels (East) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel business in India. It operates Hyatt Regency Kolkata, a five-star hotel located in the city of Kolkata. The company was formerly known as Vardhman Hotels Limited and changed its name to Asian Hotels (East) Limited in February 2010. Asian Hotels (East) Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Kolkata, India.
